short_description: Find the Strength to Heal - The Copper Compression Back Brace provides support and compression therapy that's lightweight and comfortable. It can act as a posture corrector like a corset and aids pain relief, helping you stay fit and active without restricting your movement. It's good for wearing when at rest, to aid healing chronic back pain, injury, or post surgery recovery, or as an athetic band.

Easy to Care For - The copper infused fabric will hold up to being cleaned and not lose function over the course of time. The copper itself never washes away and keeps working to extend the life of the product. Simply wash with a gentle detergent and allow to air dry completely before using again.

High Performance for All Day Wear - The breathable, moisture-wicking material keeps you cool and comfortable. It can be worn discreetly under clothes, providing healing support all day, then as you exercise after working. Commonly used for lower back or lumbar pain, sciatica, tendonitis, stiff and sore muscles, tendons & joints, and more!
What's in the Box - Each purchase includes 1 Back Brace. Fully adjustable, it can fit both men and women.
